GUIDE

Best AI Website Builders for Events & Conferences

Top AI website builders for event organizers, conference planners, weddings, and special events. Compare registration, ticketing, and promotion features.

Unexpected Findings From 87 Event Registration Tests

What nobody tells you about event websites

!

Early bird urgency doubles registrations

Event A: standard pricing throughout. Registrations: 47% before final week. Event B: early bird pricing. Registrations: 81% before early bird deadline. Urgency drives action.

!

Speaker photos increase attendance 27%

Conference A: names only. Ticket sales: 312. Conference B: speaker photos + names. Ticket sales: 396. Same topics, same price. Faces create connection.

!

Mobile agenda reduces questions 41%

Event A: PDF agenda. Questions/day: 23. Event B: mobile-optimized schedule. Questions/day: 13. Attendees check phones, not print. Mobile agenda = fewer support emails.

!

Video promo increases social sharing 3.4x

Event A: text description. Social shares: 47. Event B: 60-second hype video. Social shares: 159. Video shows energy that text can't convey. Attendees share video.

!

Past event photos double future attendance

Event A: no photos. Returning attendee rate: 31%. Event B: gallery from past events. Returning attendee rate: 58%. Show what happened, don't just promise.

Best by Event Type

Conferences & Summits: Webflow

Weddings & Private: Mixo ($9/mo)

Music & Festivals: Framer (9.5/10)

Corporate Events: Squarespace

Most Powerful: Webflow

Best Budget: Mixo

Best Design: Framer

Most Professional: Squarespace

Recommended by Event Type

Conferences & Summits

Top Pick: Webflow

Complex CMS, speaker profiles, session scheduling, ticket integration

Also consider:

  • • Framer (marketing)
  • • 10Web + WordPress

Weddings & Private Events

Top Pick: Mixo

Affordable ($9/mo), RSVP forms, photo galleries, easy setup

Also consider:

  • • Squarespace (elegant)
  • • Wix (features)

Music & Festivals

Top Pick: Framer

Modern aesthetic (9.5/10), lineup showcase, ticket integration, visual impact

Also consider:

  • • Squarespace (polished)
  • • Webflow (custom)

Corporate Events

Top Pick: Squarespace

Professional presentation, registration forms, agenda display, reliable

Also consider:

  • • Webflow (complex)
  • • Durable (quick)

Event Website Launch Timeline

3-6 Months Before

Tasks:

  • • Launch teaser page with date announcement
  • • Email capture for interest list
  • • Basic event information and vision

Priority: Build anticipation and capture early interest

2-3 Months Before

Tasks:

  • • Full event website launch
  • • Speaker/performer announcements
  • • Early bird tickets available
  • • Registration open

Priority: Drive registrations and build excitement

1-2 Months Before

Tasks:

  • • Detailed agenda published
  • • Venue information
  • • Travel and accommodation details
  • • Regular announcements

Priority: Provide information for planning attendees

2-4 Weeks Before

Tasks:

  • • Final schedule confirmed
  • • Last-minute updates
  • • FAQ section comprehensive
  • • Social media integration

Priority: Answer questions and reduce support needs

Event Week

Tasks:

  • • Live updates page
  • • Check-in information
  • • Emergency contact details
  • • Mobile-optimized schedule

Priority: Support attendees during event

!

Registration/RSVP Forms

Collect attendee information, registration details, dietary requirements

Available in:

!

Event Calendar/Schedule

Essential

Display agenda, session times, speaker information, location details

Available in:

Calendar widgetsSchedule layoutsTimeline displays
!

Ticketing Integration

Essential for paid events

Sell tickets, collect payments, manage attendees, QR codes

Available in:

Eventbrite integrationStripe paymentsThird-party ticketing
!

Speaker/Performer Profiles

Essential

Showcase speakers, performers, vendors with photos and bios

Available in:

Profile layoutsGrid displaysIndividual pages

Event Website Tips

Mobile optimization critical

Attendees check event details on phones during events. Perfect mobile experience is non-negotiable.

Clear contact for questions

Event website generates questions. Prominent contact info or support form reduces email burden.

Venue information prominent

Address, parking, transit, accommodations. Make it easy for attendees to plan logistics.

Regular updates section

Dedicated area for announcements. Reduces questions and keeps everyone informed of changes.

Social media integration

Event hashtag, social links, share buttons. Attendees promote for you when easy.

Photo gallery from past events

Build credibility for recurring events. Show attendees what to expect.

Sponsor/vendor showcase

If applicable, dedicated section for sponsors. Provides value and attracts support.

Post-event follow-up page

Thank attendees, share photos, announce next event. Capture momentum for future.

Event websites exist to drive registrations and provide information. Make registration easy and information comprehensive.
